Reason: The configuration option 'hinted_handoff_enabled' in the Cassandra software project is performance-sensitive because enabling or disabling hinted handoff can have a significant impact on system performance. Hinted handoff is a feature that helps in ensuring data consistency and availability in distributed systems, but it can also introduce additional overhead in terms of network traffic, storage usage, and processing time. Therefore, changing the value of this configuration can lead to notable variations in execution time and resource consumption, making it a performance-sensitive option.
